Alojamiento / Housing

The UPM web page for housing
http://www.upm.es/rinternacional/housing/bienvenidos_en.html
(enlace roto)
Question 24 in the FAQ covers this:
http://www.fi.upm.es/?pagina=1379&idioma=english
There is another service given by volunteers in the faculty (Student International Assistance Service, SIAS), and they have a lot of contacts of people who offer housing and helps to find a place for international students.
http://www.fi.upm.es/?id=internacional&idioma=english#Mentores
More information in the Accommodation section of:
http://www.fi.upm.es/?pagina=432
Find an apartment for a week:
http://www.homelidays.com/
(used by CRoussey in 03/2009)
Find an apartment for a long period:
http://www.easypiso.com/
( used by CRoussey in 01/2009. This web site enables to find a collocation or propose one. It is free of charge)
http://www.ma-colocation.com
(french web site and you have to pay to enter the web site)
http://www.segundamano.es
(used by CRoussey in 10/2008)
http://www.idealista.com
http://www.enalquiler.com
http://www.fotocasa.es/
http://erasmusu.com/en/erasmus-student-housing
http://madrid.easyflat.eu.com/en/accommodation/shared-flats
One visitor found a room for one month through some renting portal that made you pay in advance the room without knowing any details.
He rented a room downtown and these are the details in case someone wants to try to contact the landlady:
Nuria: 34 696 515100
C / Santa Isabel, 9 1º Dch, the Metro station is Anton Martin

LaTeX

Documento colaborativo con algunos trucos de LaTeX (tablas, listings, etc.) para aquellos que están redactando la tesis utilizando la plantilla UPM:
https://tinyurl.com/y3osdt6u
